main event: A luminous object in the sky was observed in Middletown, Ohio, on August 6 & 22, 1961.
interesting points: The object exhibited red light with flashes of brighter light,It was observed through a telescope while it climbed and leveled off,Estimations of its speed ranged from 13,000 to 17,000 m.p.h.,The object appeared to be in orbit around the Earth,No photographs were submitted with the report.
sighted object: luminous object displaying red and bright light
witness description: Residents of Middletown, age between 42 and 48, reported the sightings.
